item.title: Data visualisation portfolio
item.author: Rahul
item.description: âŒ No photoshop was harmed during the making of these visualizations Electrophysiology data Demonstration of long term potentiation from rat brain slices Replicate a famous illustration in R using ggplot Global warming's Six Americas Replicate another famous illustration in R using ggplot Leonardo Decaprio's dating story Custom coloring of title and rainbow cloud plots Raincloud plots Count number at the end of the bar and horizontal flip for more space Survey counts Template for correlation plot Rug, dot and regression line Statistics results onto the plot Comprehensive viz for linear models Office visualisation for pending tickets autolabelled Line plots Connected lines for paired data Ladder plot Comparison using radar plot.
